data.title: Bureau of Cannabis Control Launches Online Licensing Application System
data.excerpt: SACRAMENTO – The Bureau of Cannabis Control (Bureau) today officially launched its online licensing system and is now accepting applications for commercial cannabis licenses for retailers, distributors, microbusinesses, testing laboratories and cannabis events.
data.author: Department of Cannabis Control

og_meta.site_description: Learn about California cannabis laws and licenses
